definition: apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Your boss is the point where your group attaches to the tree.
sentences.chinese: 你的顶头上司就是你们组和大树的联结点。

sentences.english: The H13 steel piercer point alloyed by Re-Al is studied.
sentences.chinese: 对H13钢穿孔顶头进行了稀土铝合金化研究。

sentences.english: A strong head wind lashed the river into waves.
sentences.chinese: 一股顶头风在河中掀起了波浪。

sentences.english: He was unjustly blamed by his immediate supperior.
sentences.chinese: 他受到顶头上司的错怪。

sentences.english: He is the head honcho of the company.
sentences.chinese: 他是我们公司的顶头上司。

sentences.english: House leakage slants meet rain of the same night, the ship breaking met the head wind.
sentences.chinese: 屋漏偏逢连夜雨，船破又遇顶头风。

sentences.english: Some parameters of the piercing heads and piercing force are given by using UBE method.
sentences.chinese: 顶头形状设计是压力穿孔机理论研究的重要内容。

sentences.english: Four trees were to be seen at its extremity.
The imperial wind what resembles hangs head.
Your first action should be to raise any issues or concerns you have with your line manager.
sentences.chinese: 第一个行动应该是和顶头上司谈论你的问题和担忧。

sentences.english: Let's go from the top of the page.
sentences.chinese: 让我们从这页顶头开始。

sentences.english: I just remembered to a bunch of higher-ups.
sentences.chinese: 想起来我还要一堆顶头上司批准的咧。

sentences.english: He leaned over backwards to please his immediate superior.
sentences.chinese: 他拼命讨好他的顶头上司。

sentences.english: The manufacture and process techniques of the wrought Mo alloy piercing mandrel have been introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了变形态钼合金穿管顶头的研制及其工艺技术。

definition: right in the midpoint/a bull's eye/to hit the nail on the head
middle/center/right in the middle or center/nub
above/on top of/on the surface of
(of alcohol) to go to one's head/(old) (of a bride-to-be) to bind one's hair into a bun/(of a prostitute) to receive a patron for the first time
